about_the_game:
Captain McSpacebiff is a first person shooter/ third person brawler, action game set in a wacky atom-punk universe.

Gameplay

Stand against the dastardly forces of an Alien Civilization and the Soviet Moonion armed with nothing but your fists and a wide array of other deadly weapons.

Experience a unique blend of third person brawler and first person shooter combat with your friends. Enemies utilize both ranged and melee weapons so plan your attack and defense carefully. Choose the right weapon for each situation to efficiently dispense freedom upon the enemies of Planet America!

Story

You are a brave Captain in Planet America's Stellar Navy.
You've been sent solo on a reconnaissance mission across space and time to solve the mystery of a lost colony in the far reaches of the known universe.

When you arrive you find the remnants of the colony are in desperate need of help against two familiar foes: The Soviet Moonion and their own incompetence...

This is no surprise and falls well within the expected mission parameters, however there is another new threat looming in the dark reaches of unmapped space that could threaten Planet America’s very existence, and even the existence of Freedom itself.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Step into the moonboots of Captain McSpacebiff to shoot, punch and dodge your way through enemies. You have crashed on a strange Planet America colony at the edge of space. With the help of your friends, collect ship parts to gain new abilities, save the doofy locals and vanquish the Soviet Moonion!
